[SYNTAX]: "he command" instead of "he commanded" (Caddo chief's instructions)
[LEXICON]: Archaic vocabulary (e.g., "happily hunting-grounds," "spill wine") may hinder readability for modern readers

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt shift from Red Feather’s story to De Soto’s arrival (no contextual bridge)
[STRUCTURE]: Unconnected historical anecdotes (e.g., LaSalle, De Agreda) lack explicit narrative links
[CLARITY]: Assumes prior knowledge of regional geography and figures (e.g., "the Redlands," "the New Philippines")

[GRAMMAR]: Tense inconsistency ("were place" instead of "were placed")
Verb-subject mismatch ("Correspondence find" instead of "was found")

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt transition between discussing the town’s early development and the Philip Nolan expedition without contextual linking
